name: Little Squirrel Adventure
description:
Student Name: Justin Kung

Game Title: Little Squirrel Adventure

This is the tale of a small squirrel on the hunt for some fruit! 

And he won't give up until he has enough to fill his home!

Features!

* One stubborn squirrel

* 5 challenging levels

* Out of nowhere surprises!

* and Fun for the Entire Family

This is a short 5 level platformer game that introduces challenging obstacles for the player to overcome. Players will climb through massive trees, hop over rapid waters, and rush through the undergrowth of this never ending forest.

Sources: 

Mechanics code created by Michael Baker - University of Texas at Austin.

Music arrangement created by Hirokazu Ando - (Green Greens)
